attributes.action: Prosecute politicians that lied when they said we would leave on the 29/03/19
attributes.additional_details: PM May lied all the way through the process
attributes.background:
If Boris Johnson can be tried for lying then so can the rest. 19 billion which we would not have to pay divided by 52 weeks is 165 million plus
even on 18 .5 billion is over 355 million.  He didn't lie

rejection.details: The decision to prosecute someone is the responsibility of the Crown Prosecution Service and not the UK Government or Parliament.
